/usr/bin/g++    -std=c++11 -w -g   CMakeFiles/implicit_fairing.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/implicit_fairing.dir/mesh_processing.cpp.o CMakeFiles/implicit_fairing.dir/viewer.cpp.o  -o implicit_fairing -rdynamic ../externals/surface_mesh/libsurface_mesh.so.1.0 ../nanogui/libnanogui.a -lGL -lXxf86vm -lXrandr -lXinerama -lXcursor -lXi -lX11 -lpthread -lrt -ldl -Wl,-rpath,/home/a/Bureau/DGP2016_exercises/build-dgp2016-exercise5/externals/surface_mesh
